evidence.claim: Southern Health Partners emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations in their healthcare services.
They utilize HL7 standards in data exchange processes within their health systems.
The company integrates with various EHR systems adhering to X12 transaction sets.
Southern Health Partners mentions the use of FHIR for interoperability and streamlined healthcare data sharing.
The organization highlights their commitment to leveraging EDI for efficient billing and patient data management.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in HIPAA X12 transactions, which aligns with API-first data exchange needs.
